techmeme.title: Analysis: Perplexity seems to scrape sites using surreptitious methods, ignoring robots.txt, with a Perplexity-tied machine doing so on Wired and other sites (Wired)
Amazon plans to invest €10B to expand cloud and logistics in Germany, including €8.8B by 2026 on AWS, taking its total planned German investment to €17.8B (Reuters)
Panasonic unveils the Toughbook 40 Mk2, a 14-inch rugged laptop aimed at police and others, with up to Intel Core Ultra 7, 5G, and IP66, on sale now for $4,699+ (João Carrasqueira/XDA Developers)
China plans new measures to encourage venture capital into its tech sector, including letting investors set up yuan funds; 2023 VC investment fell 7% to $69.9B (Foster Wong/Bloomberg)
VR game studio Another Axiom says Gorilla Tag passed $100M in revenue since its early 2021 launch, one of the most successful VR games ever, and has 3M MAUs (Ben Lang/Road to VR)
